Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal document dated year 10 of Ptolemy IV Philopator. 6 ll. on recto, list of 16 witnesses on verso. Tatasetaat daughter of Petemonthes sells unbuilt land in Armant to Tasheretkhemt daughter of Totoes. Scribe Herieus son of Harsiesis
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1990a / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum IV: Ptolemaic Legal Texts from the Theban Area (p.85-7, pl.70, 72-3)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (2729) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/2729)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss Black ink Backed: brown paper Supported locally: gelatin Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B
